Institution Name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY, MAKOGI-OBA, OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
To qualify for entry into the 3-year programme for the award of a B.Sc. Degree in Accounting, a candidate must fulfil the following:

a. Possess Five O’ level credit passes at not more than two sittings including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects from the following: Geography, Biology, Commerce, Government, Account and Book-keeping at not more than two sittings.

b. Possess two A’ Level passes in relevant commercial courses acceptable to the University.

c. Possess Ordinary National Diploma Lower Credit in relevant courses including Accounting, Finance, Insurance, Banking and other Financial Studies courses.

d. Possess National Certificate of Education, Merit in relevant courses including Accounting, Finance, Insurance, Banking and other Financial Studies courses
UTME Requirements: Possess Five O’ level credit passes at not more than two sittings including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects from the following: Geography, Biology, Commerce, Government, Account and Book-keeping at not more than two sittings.
Subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other subject.

Institution Name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY, MAKOGI-OBA, OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Direct entry into 200 Level must have at least five ordinary level credits with a minimum of two relevant subjects at GCE/IJMB Advanced Level or any approved equivalents in relevant subjects.
UTME Requirements: Good scores in UTME and must have the following minimum qualifications in SSCE or its equivalent with credit level passes in five subjects at not more than two sittings. These include; English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics. Candidates must have an acceptable score in Post UTME Screening.
Subjects: U.T.M.E subjects are English language, Biology, Chemistry and Physics

Institution Name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY, MAKOGI-OBA, OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Candidates seeking admission by Direct Entry into 200 Level in B.Sc (Hons) Biology must have at least five (5) O’level credits in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics, and are also required to have passed a minimum of two (2) relevant subjects (which must include Biology) at JUPEB, GCE/IJMB Advanced level or any approved equivalents in relevant science subjects.
UTME Requirements: Candidates should possess the following minimum qualifications: SSCE or its equivalents with credit level passes in five subjects at not more than two (2) sittings. These include English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics. Candidates must also earn an acceptable score in the post UTME screening.
Subjects: U.T.M.E subjects are English language, Biology, Chemistry and Physics

Institution Name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY, MAKOGI-OBA, OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: In addition to the ordinary level requirements, candidates for admission should possess Ordinary National Diploma from a recognized tertiary institution, with a minimum of 2nd Class Lower Division.
UTME Requirements: Candidates seeking admission to the four year Degree programme should possess SSCE or their equivalents with at least five credit passes which must include English Language, Mathematics and Economics and pass at the University Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME).
Subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics and one other subject.

Institution Name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY, MAKOGI-OBA, OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Students with an Ordinary National Diploma from an accredited polytechnic or other equivalent institutions, will be considered for admission provided they graduated from the respective institutions with a minimum of Lower Credit grade (or its equivalent) in addition to fulfilling the O’ Level subject requirement listed above. Candidates with at least two passes in JUPEB/IJMB or its equivalent in relevant subjects may be considered for admission through direct entry into second year.
UTME Requirements: The prospective candidates must have a minimum of five credits in Mathematics, English Language, Chemistry, Physics and any other relevant science subjects at the Ordinary level (O’ Levels) Senior Secondary School Certificate Examinations at not more than two sittings.
Subjects: The UTME subject combination required for admission is English Language, Chemistry and any of Physics, Mathematics and Biology.

Institution Name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY, MAKOGI-OBA, OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Direct Entry—Candidates seeking admission by Direct Entry into 200 level Computer Science degree programme of the University must have at least five (5) O’level credits with a minimum of two (2) relevant subjects at Advance level of any approved equivalents
UTME Requirements: UTME- for admission into Computer Science first degree programme of the University, candidates are required to possess at least credit level passes in five subjects including English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any of Biology/Agricultural Science/Economics/Geography in SSCE or its equivalents at not more than two (2) sittings. In addition, candidates must also earn an acceptable pass mark in the UTME and post UTME screening.
Subjects: UTME SUBJECTS: The Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME) subjects are English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

Institution Name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY, MAKOGI-OBA, OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
Admission through Direct Entry is for a three year programme, starting at 200 level. The candidate must have five credit passes at WASCE or its equivalent in relevant subjects, including English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics, and any one of Economics/Geography, Biology/Agricultural Science, at not more than two sittings. In addition, candidates must have A-Level passes in two relevant subjects from Mathematics and  Physics or Chemistry. Candidates with appropriate ND/OND/HND or NCE passes in relevant courses may also be considered for admission.

Holders of HND at minimum of Lower Credit in Computer Science are eligible for consideration for admission into 300 level.
UTME Requirements: Admission through the UTME is for a four year programme. The candidate must have five credit passes at WASCE or its equivalent in relevant subjects including English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics, and any one of Economics/Geography, Biology/Agricultural Science, at not more than two sittings. In addition, candidates must have the required acceptable score at the Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME).
Subjects: The UTME subject must be English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry/any science subject.

Institution Name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY, MAKOGI-OBA, OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
To be considered for admission into the 3-year degree programme, candidates must have passed, at credit level, five subjects including English Language, Economics and Mathematics and other two relevant subjects in either Arts or Social Sciences at the Senior Secondary School Certificates/GCE Ordinary Level or its equivalent in addition to two A Level passes or JUPEB or its equivalents in relevant subjects including Economics.

(Note: Commerce is not one of the subjects accepted in the Department of Economics).
UTME Requirements: Candidates must have obtained credit passes in five subjects at a sitting or five subjects at not more than two sittings at ‘O’ Level/Senior Secondary Certificate (WAEC, NECO etc.) Examinations.  The credits must include English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects in Arts or Social Sciences.
Subjects: Candidates must take at the UTME, English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other Arts or Social Sciences subjects.

Institution Name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY, MAKOGI-OBA, OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: In addition to the above stated “O” level subjects, ONLY candidates who possess JUPEBIJMB result or Diploma in English language-related courses result are considered for admission. Such Diploma MUST be with minimum of Lower Credit. A candidate who has successfully gone through the JUPEB Foundation programme in two relevant Arts and Social Science subjects is also qualified to be considered for admission.
UTME Requirements: It is required that candidates must possess 5 O’ Level Credits at not more than two (2) sittings including English Language, Literature-in-English and any other three subjects in arts or social sciences.
Subjects: Candidates must take at the Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examinations [UTME], English Language, Literature in English and any other two subjects from the Social Sciences and the Arts.

Institution Name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY, MAKOGI-OBA, OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
Possess Five O’ level credit passes at not more than two sittings including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects from the following: Geography, Biology, Commerce, Government, Account and Book-keeping at not more than two sittings.

b. Possess three A’ Level passes in TWO relevant commercial courses acceptable to the University.

c. Possess Ordinary National Diploma Lower Credit in relevant courses including Accounting, Finance, Insurance, Banking and other Financial Studies courses.

d. Possess National Certificate of Education, Merit in relevant courses including Accounting, Finance, Insurance, Banking and other Financial Studies courses.
UTME Requirements: Possess Five O’ level credit passes at not more than two sittings including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects from the following: Geography, Biology, Commerce, Government, Account and Book-keeping at not more than two sittings.
Subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics, and any other subjects.

Institution Name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY, MAKOGI-OBA, OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
Candidate for Direct Entry must have good passes at the GCE A/L, ND, NCE or their equivalents provided he/she meets the minimum entry requirements. In addition, the candidate for direct entry admission must submit a portfolio containing samples of his/her works to the Head of the Department of Fine & Applied Arts at the time he/she is returning the application forms to the Admissions office.           

Holders of HND at minimum of Lower Credit in Fine and Applied Arts are eligible for consideration for admission into 300 level.
UTME Requirements: English Language, Mathematics and Any other three subjects from Arts, Science or Commercial.
Subjects: English Language and  Any three (3) Arts, Science, or Social Sciences subjects.

Institution Name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY, MAKOGI-OBA, OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
Direct Entry candidates must fulfil the O’level requirement above and have a minimum of Lower Credit at the ND Examination or equivalent from a recognized institution or G.C.E (Advanced Level) or equivalent in at least two science subjects including Biology or Agricultural Science to qualify for admission into 200 level of the programme.

Holders of HND at minimum of Lower Credit in relevant discipline are eligible for consideration for admission into 300 level.
UTME Requirements: Candidates must have five credits in O’ level or SSCE or NECO at not more than two sittings to include credit pass in Mathematics, English, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and Physics           .
Subjects: English language, Chemistry, Physics or Mathematics and Biology/Agricultural Science

UTME Requirements: Candidates must have five credits in O’ level or SSCE or NECO at not more than two sittings to include credit pass in Mathematics, English, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and Physics           .
Subjects: English language, Chemistry, Physics and any other ONE of Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science

Direct Entry candidates must fulfil the conditions in O’ Level requirements and have a minimum of Lower Credit at the ND Examination or equivalent from a recognized institution or G.C.E (Advanced Level) or equivalent in at least two science subjects including Physics and Chemistry to qualify for admission into 200 level of the programme.

 

Holders of HND at minimum of Lower Credit in relevant discipline are eligible for consideration for admission into 300 level.

Students with an Ordinary National Diploma from an accredited polytechnic or other equivalent institutions, will be considered for admission provided they graduated from the respective institutions with a minimum of Lower Credit grade (or its equivalent) in addition to fulfilling the O’ Level subject requirement listed above. Institution Name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY, MAKOGI-OBA, OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: TWO JUPEB passes or A Level in relevant subjects, National Diploma in Journalism, Mass Communication or Media Studies (with at least Lower Credit) from recognized universities, and NCE (English Language combination) with Lower Credit.
UTME Requirements: Candidates must have obtained five credit passes at one sitting or five credits passes at two sittings at the ‘O’ Level/Senior Secondary Certificate (WAEC; NECO etc.). Such credits must include English Language, Literature in English and Mathematics and two other relevant subjects.
Subjects: Subjects include: English, Literature-in-English and any other two subjects from social sciences, sciences and Arts.

Institution Name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY, MAKOGI-OBA, OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Direct Entry: In addition to the ‘O’ level requirements, as stated above, candidate must possess two A – Level passes in Mathematics and at least one of Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Economics or Geography. Equivalently, candidate should possess good NCE certificate with Mathematics and any one of the Sciences written above as teaching subjects. NCE candidates are expected to pass at distinction or credit level. OND candidates with at least distinction or upper credit are qualified for admission. Candidates with JUPEB Certificate are also eligible.
UTME Requirements: UTME ENTRY: Candidates for admission into the B.Sc. (Hons) degree in Mathematics must possess 5 (five) O – level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Further Mathematics, Physics and any of Chemistry or Biology or Economics or Geography.
Subjects: UTME SUBJECTS: The unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME) subjects are English, Mathematics, Physics and any one of Chemistry or Economics or Geography.

Institution Name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY, MAKOGI-OBA, OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
Two A Level passes including Music.

Candidates with the following qualifications are eligible to apply for admission into 2nd year of the Music Programme:

-           Joint University Provisional Examination Board (JUPEB) - Music

-           OND from a recognized institution with a minimum of Upper Credit

-           NCE (Music Major) not less than Merit

 

Candidates with minimum of Grade 7 Certificate from any of the following bodies: Associated Board of Royal School of Music (ABRSM), Mountain Top International Music School (MIMS), Musical Society of Nigeria (MUSON) or Trinity College of Music (TCM) may also be considered.
UTME Requirements: Candidates must have at least five (5) credits at the SSCE (or its equivalents) in English Language and any other four subjects chosen from Social Sciences, Arts and Natural Sciences at not more than two sittings. While a Credit pass in Music at SSCE level is not mandatory it is desirable. A minimum of a Grade 5 Certificate of the Associated Board of Royal School of Music (ABRSM), Mountain Top International Music School (MIMS), Musical Society of Nigeria (MUSON) or Trinity College of Music (TCM) will be considered as an equivalent of an SSCE Music credit pass.
Subjects: English Language, and any other three subjects

Institution Name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY, MAKOGI-OBA, OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
Five credits in General Certificate of Education, Ordinary Level and NECO at least two of which must be a GCE Advanced Level including Christian Religious Knowledge as in UTME above; and then,

 A pass in two principal subjects at the NCE Level/ A/L, or JUPEB and/or the equivalent plus five subjects at credit level in GCE O/L, SSCE, NECO, and TC II are acceptable in MTU

A Three-Year Diploma in any Theological Seminary or College recognized by the University plus five credits at the GCE ‘O’ Level including English Language and CRK.

Eligible holders of Mountain Top Bible College Diploma could be admitted for a two-year programme leading to the award of B.A Degree in Mountain Top University’s Religious Studies.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) Credit level passes in the SSCE/NECO/GCE (O/L) to include English Language, and CRK/BK/, and any other three subjects among the following: Government/Civic Education, Literature in English, Economics/Commerce, Music, Fine Arts.
Subjects: JAMB/UTME SUBJECTS: Candidates are required to register and pass English Language, and any other three of the following: CRS, Government/Civic Education, Literature in English, Economics/Commerce, etc. including any from natural sciences.

Institution Name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY, MAKOGI-OBA, OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Accounting, Economics, Management, Mathematics, Geography and Statistics.




To qualify for entry into the 3-year programme for the award of a B.Sc. Degree in Securities and Investments, a candidate must fulfil the following:

a. Possess Five O’ level credit passes at not more than two sittings including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects from the following: Geography, Biology, Commerce, Government, Account and Book-keeping at not more than two sittings.

b. Possess two A’ Level passes in  the relevant commercial courses acceptable to the University such as Economics, Geography and Government.

c. Possess Ordinary National Diploma Lower Credit in relevant courses including Accounting, Finance, Insurance, Banking and other Financial Studies courses.

 

d. Possess National Certificate of Education, Merit in relevant courses including Accounting, Finance, Insurance, Banking and other Financial Studies courses.

 

e. Holders of HND at minimum of lower credit in relevant discipline are eligible for consideration for admission into 300 level.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include: English Language, Mathematics and any other subjects. For NBC, the other two (2) relevant subjects could be from any of the following; Accounting, Principles of Accounts, Commerce, Office Practice and Economics.
Subjects: Candidates are expected to take English Language, Mathematics, and any other two subjects.

'Candidates seeking admission by Direct Entry into 200 level Software Engineering degree programme of the University must have at least five (5) O’level credits with a minimum of two (2) relevant subjects at Advance level of any approved equivalents.

UTME Requirements: for admission into Software Engineering first degree programme of the University, candidates are required to possess at least credit level passes in five subjects including English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any of Biology/Agricultural Science or Economics or Geography in SSCE or its equivalents at not more than two (2) sittings
Subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry/Computer Science.
